column2: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.
ARN of the CodePipeline Service Role

Endpoint used to connect to the Jenkins Server

[{u'PolicyName': u'root', u'PolicyDocument': {u'Version': u'2012-10-17', u'Statement': [{u'Action': [u's3:GetObject', u's3:GetObjectVersion', u's3:GetBucketVersioning'], u'Resource': u'*', u'Effect': u'Allow'}, {u'Action': [u's3:PutObject'], u'Resource': [u'arn:aws:s3:::codepipeline*', u'arn:aws:s3:::elasticbeanstalk*'], u'Effect': u'Allow'}, {u'Action': [u'codedeploy:CreateDeployment', u'codedeploy:GetApplicationRevision', u'codedeploy:GetDeployment', u'codedeploy:GetDeploymentConfig', u'codedeploy:RegisterApplicationRevision'], u'Resource': u'*', u'Effect': u'Allow'}, {u'Action': [u'elasticbeanstalk:*', u'ec2:*', u'elasticloadbalancing:*', u'autoscaling:*', u'cloudwatch:*', u's3:*', u'sns:*', u'cloudformation:*', u'rds:*', u'sqs:*', u'ecs:*', u'iam:PassRole'], u'Resource': u'*', u'Effect': u'Allow'}, {u'Action': [u'lambda:InvokeFunction', u'lambda:ListFunctions'], u'Resource': u'*', u'Effect': u'Allow'}]}}]
[{u'ToPort': u'65535', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'0.0.0.0/0', u'FromPort': u'0'}, {u'ToPort': u'65535', u'IpProtocol': u'udp', u'CidrIp': u'0.0.0.0/0', u'FromPort': u'0'}]
Enable internal access to the NAT device

{u'Fn::Base64': {u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#!/bin/bash -x
', u'yum update -y
', u'#Install Git, Apache Bench, PostgreSQL, PHP, and CloudWatch Logs
', u'yum install -y git httpd-tools awslogs postgresql php
', u'sleep 30
', u'#Set up environment variables
', u'export REGION=', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'
', u'export AMI_ID=', {u'Fn::FindInMap': [u'AmazonLinuxAMI', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'AMI']}, u'
', u'export SG_ID=', {u'Ref': u'CIInstanceSecurityGroup'}, u'
', u'export SUBNET_ID=', {u'Ref': u'DevPublicSubnet'}, u'
', u'export KEYNAME=', {u'Ref': u'KeyName'}, u'
', u'mkdir /home/ec2-user/setup
', u'#####################################################################################################################
', u'# Update sudoers file to not require a TTY for sudo.
', u"sed -i 's/^Defaults    requiretty/#&/' /etc/sudoers
", u'mkdir /home/ec2-user/.aws 
', u'cat > /home/ec2-user/.aws/config <<EOF
', u'[default]
', u'region = ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'
', u'EOF
', u'chown -R ec2-user:ec2-user /home/ec2-user/.aws
', u'#Installing Jenkins 
', u'wget -O /etc/yum.repos.d/jenkins.repo http://pkg.jenkins-ci.org/redhat/jenkins.repo
', u'rpm --import http://pkg.jenkins-ci.org/redhat-stable/jenkins-ci.org.key
', u'sleep 5 && yum install -y jenkins
', u'chkconfig jenkins on
', u'# Download CodePipeline plugin and Cloudformation plugin (prior to starting Jenkins Service)
', u'mkdir /var/lib/jenkins/plugins && chown -R jenkins:jenkins /var/lib/jenkins
', u'wget -O /var/lib/jenkins/plugins/aws-codepipeline-plugin-for-jenkins.hpi http://updates.jenkins-ci.org/latest/aws-codepipeline.hpi
', u'wget -O /var/lib/jenkins/plugins/jenkins-cloudformation-plugin.hpi http://updates.jenkins-ci.org/latest/jenkins-cloudformation-plugin.hpi
', u'# Start jenkins, pause for a few, then install remaining plugins
', u'service jenkins start && sleep 30
', u'# Generate SSH key for Jenkins - CodeCommit integration
', u"ssh-keygen -b 2048 -t rsa -f /home/ec2-user/.ssh/id_rsa -q -N '' && chown -R ec2-user:ec2-user /home/ec2-user
", u'mkdir /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh && cp /home/ec2-user/.ssh/id_rsa /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/id_rsa
', u'ciUserName=', {u'Ref': u'CIUser'}, u'
', u"ciPubKeyId=$(aws iam upload-ssh-public-key --user-name $ciUserName --ssh-public-key-body file:///home/ec2-user/.ssh/id_rsa.pub --query 'SSHPublicKey.SSHPublicKeyId')
", u'# setup ssh config file for AWS CodeCommit
', u'echo "Host git-codecommit.*.amazonaws.com" >> /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/config
', u'echo "  User $ciPubKeyId" >> /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/config
', u'echo "  IdentityFile /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/id_rsa" >> /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/config
', u'echo "  StrictHostKeyChecking no" >> /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/config
', u'sudo chown -R jenkins:jenkins /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/
', u'# Jenkins: Install plugs and set up environment
', u'cd /var/lib/jenkins && wget http://localhost:8080/jnlpJars/jenkins-cli.jar && mkdir tmp
', u'echo "export KEYNAME=$KEYNAME" >> /var/lib/jenkins/.env_config
', u'echo "export REGION=$REGION" >> /var/lib/jenkins/.env_config
', u'chown -R jenkins:jenkins /var/lib/jenkins
', u'java -jar jenkins-cli.jar -s http://localhost:8080 install-plugin git git-client s3 awseb-deployment-plugin codedeploy -deploy -restart && sleep 30
', u'# All is well so signal success
', u"/opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -s true '", {u'Ref': u'CIInstanceWaitHandle01'}, u"'
"]]}}
[{u'Value': u'Dev Private NACL', u'Key': u'Network'}, {u'Value': u'Development', u'Key': u'Environment'}]

Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance
